Posts.Content: Hi Tracey big hugs to you i dont know what to say to you. I too found a lump last month and had it removed i thought that was the end of it but i have been told that it is Lobular Cancer and i would need Chemo, Radio and HRT plus i am going in for another operation today because they did not get enough clerance. I do have children so ant imagine what you are going through just want to let you know that if you want a chat or to let a bit of steam off then come on here .   XXX
Posts.Title: Recently diagnosed and considering treatment options

Posts.Content: Hi has anybody had the Onkatype Dx test and if so did it mean that they did not have Chemo as a result of this test xxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Onkatype Dx
Not what i wanted to hear
Not what i wanted to hear

Posts.Content: Hi Tina .Thank you so much for your words of kindness.I have the doctors on Thursday so will ask about counselling       Carol
Posts.Title: Dealing with the aftermarth

Posts.Content: Hi all . I have just started my Radio Therapy and am on day 3 .Boob is a little sore but really ok physically.Mt question is emotionally. I had my Operation on 15th September to remove my tumour and Lymp nodes .Got my results on 24th September Lobular cancer and need to operate again as not enough clearance but Lymp nodes clear.2nd op on 11th October and all sucesseful.Doctor said i would need Chemo and Radio and Tamoxifen. I was private so asked about Oncotype DX test which i had done .It came back that there was a small chance in the intermediate section that it would reoccur so i decided not to have Chemo. Since that diagnosis i have been so depressed and i cant stop crying.I did go back to work but could not cope so have decided that the month i am having treatment i am having off work , Im not sure if its the Tamoxifen or the fact that its finally hit me that i had Cancer ,Has anybody else found that Tamoxifen does this ?
Posts.Title: Dealing with the aftermarth
